ideas.title: cat_breed_explorer
ideas.description: This application allows users to discover and learn about different cat breeds, providing a seamless experience between breed information and interesting facts about cats. Users can browse cat breeds, then directly see related facts about them, fostering curiosity and providing educational content.
apis_used: cat facts (Retrieve a list of cat breeds)
cat facts (Retrieve a random cat fact) - First the application displays a list of cat breeds
and upon selecting a specific breed
it retrieves and displays a random cat fact to the user.
